transcript.title: STAFF CHANGES
transcript.content:
Fax from 3
MAY 26 ' 97 16 26/ 05/ 97 13: 02 Pg:
12: 57 PRIME MINISTER
STAFF CHANGES
With Nicole Feely joining the Sydney Organising Committee of the Olympic Games,
Grahame Morris becomes my Chief of Staff and political adviser.
Arthur Sinodinos will take on a new role of Policy Director in addition to his current
role of Economic Adviser.
Tony Nutt will move from the Attorney-General's Office to become my Principal
Private Secretary.
Anthony Benscher moves from the Press Office to become Senior Adviser in a number
of portfolios including communications, industrial relations and education.
26 May 1997
